name: TakewInc.
tag_list: online, recruitment, internship, student, university, company, job, posting, board, emerging, countries
overview:
TakewInc. is a web application that helps students to get introduced with companies from emerging countries. Thanks to TakewInc, they can share common values and contribute in each-other enhancement using game mechanics. Users are encouraged and rated to increase internship program efficiency.

To students, TakewInc. is a tool used to find internships, following and comparing their progression as a junior in terms of impact in companies. The long-term tracking allows them to organize their career plan until they got their dreamed job.

To companies, TakewInc. is a platform that both encourages the intern to support and help the company; and then he/she is rated according to he/she engagement and performance during the internship. The long-term tracking, the ranking system and the highly-customizable profile allows them to find student that match their corporate value.
